summary: Me playing detective Pikachu after having the game so long.. ' ok beside the missing father, they need investigate a drug that...
body: Me playing detective Pikachu after having the game so long.. ’ ok beside the missing father, they need investigate a drug that cause Pokemon go berserk. ( Why does this sound like an anime I just watch finish) As always I will play in Japanese voice and heck why Tim (MC) voice is so boring but sound so familiar. Go Google… ‘TIM’s VA IS ASH LYNX’s VA’. Ok. It’s all banana fish all over again in Pokemon world without Eiji but still with middle age man. I mean Pikachu.

summary:
Detective Pikachu Might Give Hope for Future Video Game Films 

There’s no guarantee the Detective Pikachu movie will end up as...
caption:
Detective Pikachu Might Give Hope for Future Video Game Films

There’s no guarantee the Detective Pikachu movie will end up as good as the trailers portray it, but looking at it now it appears that there’s a genuine amount of care that’s gone into this film. Detective Pikachu might just be the perfect way for people to realize video game movies have a lot of potential, as long as they understand the pieces that need to fit in order to make it work. 

Read more!

https://www.hardcoregamer.com/2019/01/28/detective-pikachu-might-give-hope-for-future-video-game-films/323480/

title: Mogelijk vervolg Detective Pikachu gepland
body:
Het eerste deel van Detective Pikachu verschijnt mei pas in de bioscoop, maar volgens geruchten zou er al een plan klaarliggen voor een tweede deel van de film.

In het eerste deel zien we Pikachu, wiens stem is ingesproken door Ryan Reynolds., een jongen helpen die opzoek is naar zijn vermiste vader. Dit deel is gebaseerd op de gelijknamige game die we eerder op de Nintendo 3DS zagen verschijnen.

Voor het tweede deel van de film zou nog geen script zijn, maar deze moet volgens geruchten geschreven worden door Oren Uziel. Oren is onder andere bekend van films als “The Cloverfield Paradox”en “22 Jump Street”.

Geheel onverwacht zou het niet zijn, omdat er eerder al het gerucht ging dat er meer live action movies zouden komen van Pokémon waaronder 1 in het teken van red en blue.

Mogelijk vervolg Detective Pikachu gepland was originally published on GameXplorers

summary: I’m convinced the Detective Pikachu game (and probably the movie too, but that remains to be seen) takes place in an alternate...
body:
I’m convinced the Detective Pikachu game (and probably the movie too, but that remains to be seen) takes place in an alternate timeline where pokéballs were never invented.

Pokéballs are never mentioned in the game at all.

There’s even a section where you have to capture a gengar with a net to interrogate them. The idea of trying a pokéball first never comes up.

The lack of pokéballs would also explain how most humans in that game only have one pokémon partner who’s always out and visible. It’s way harder to get a full team when you have no way to somewhat reliably get more pokémon. This could also be due to only trainers interested in competitive battles actively seeking to grow their teams (and we don’t see those in that particular game because they’re not relevant to Tim’s journey not the focus for once). Let’s say it’s a mix of both.

Maybe taking the somewhat-sci-fi elements that are pokéballs and pokémon storage via PC (also never mentioned) out of the pokémon world was an attempt to make it feel slightly closer to reality while still having superpowered creatures everywhere?

Pokéballs are never mentioned in the game at all.

There’s even a section where you have to capture a gengar with a net to interrogate them. The idea of trying a pokéball first never comes up.

The lack of pokéballs would also explain how most humans in that game only have one pokémon partner who’s always out and visible. It’s way harder to get a full team when you have no way to somewhat reliably get more pokémon. This could also be due to only trainers interested in competitive battles actively seeking to grow their teams (and we don’t see those in that particular game because they’re not relevant to Tim’s journey not the focus for once). Let’s say it’s a mix of both.

Maybe taking the somewhat-sci-fi elements that are pokéballs and pokémon storage via PC (also never mentioned) out of the pokémon world was an attempt to make it feel slightly closer to reality while still having superpowered creatures everywhere?

summary: so i finished detective pikachu yesterday and... it was a p cool game! not v challenging tho so it felt more like some sort of...
body: so i finished detective pikachu yesterday and… it was a p cool game! not v challenging tho so it felt more like some sort of interactive novel or something but whatever… i rlly mostly loved seeing pokemon in a non battle setting and seeing all the kinds of partnerships between ppl and pokemon (like the yanma cameras! and the frillish waiters!) and i hope this inspires the pokemon company in ideas for future spin-off games! i feel like theres a lot of potential to explore in the pkmn world but a lot of what we get in terms of spin-offs is stuff like shuffle or rumble, so i hope we get more diverse game concepts based on all the aspects of the pokemon world (like a pkmn breeder game… gf pls…) also on another note the voice acting was cool hopefully we might get it in a mainline game in the future

title: A Podcast Called FRED #52
body:
A Podcast Called FRED #52

Kendall, Fulya, and Phillip deliver the latest in nerdy news and geeky goodness in the pop culture podcast that refuses to behave—it’s A Podcast Called FRED!

Nerdy News includes:

  • Matt Smith cast in an undisclosed role in Morbius: The Living Vampire;
  • Detective Pikachu sequel already in the works;
  • The Lost Boys TV series pilot ordered at the CW;
  • and more!

Trailer Park discussions:

summary: פוקימון: הבלש פיקאצ'ו - סרט ההמשך כבר בדרך
title: פוקימון: הבלש פיקאצ'ו - סרט ההמשך כבר בדרך
body:
פוקימון: הבלש פיקאצ’ו – סרט ההמשך כבר בדרך

“פוקימון: הבלש פיקאצ’ו” סרט הלייב-אקשן מיקום הפוקימון שאליו כולם מצפים, מקבל כבר דיווחים על תחילת העבודות לסרט המשך שאותו יכתוב הכותב של הסרט- “רחוב ג’אמפ 22”- אורן עוזיאל.

המותג פוקימון נהיה בשנים האחרונות עוד יותר מפורסם ממה שהיה, עם המשחק משנת 2016- “Pokemon Go“, המשחק החדש ל-Nintendo Switch ועכשיו עם הסרט העומד להגיע אל הקולנועים במאי 2019- “פוקימון: הבלש פיקאצ’ו”, המציג את פיקצ’ו המפורסם…

View On WordPress

summary: Rumor: There Is Already A Detective Pikachu Movie Sequel In The Works
title: Rumor: There Is Already A Detective Pikachu Movie Sequel In The Works
body:
Rumor: There Is Already A Detective Pikachu Movie Sequel In The Works

The Detective Pikachumovie hasn’t even released yet, and it seems that there are already plans to make a sequel. According to the Hollywood Reporter “Legendary has begun work on a sequel to its Pokemon-based movie, hiring Oren Uziel to pen the script”. The Hollywood Reporter explained that this decision is a “sign of confidence” about the success of the film, which isn’t supposed to release…

View On WordPress

summary:
DETECTIVE PIKACHU 2 Is Happening

#DetectivePikachu arrives this summer, just two weeks after #AvengersEndGame but Legendary and...
caption:
DETECTIVE PIKACHU 2 Is Happening

#DetectivePikachu arrives this summer, just two weeks after #AvengersEndGame but Legendary and WB seem to feel confident enough that “Detective Pikachu 2” is reportedly already in development.

summary:
'Detective Pikachu 2' is already in the works at Legendary
 Legendary is betting big on Detective Pikachu raking in the big...
caption:
‘Detective Pikachu 2’ is already in the works at Legendary

Legendary is betting big on Detective Pikachu raking in the big bucks at the box office. So much in fact that they’ve already announced a sequel!
